author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
Today, we explore the Were-worms of Middle-earth!  Although they are only briefly mentioned, we will look at possible real-world inspirations for these creatures, what Tolkien likely envisioned, and how they've been adapted in films.

To purchase artist work, check out these amazing artists!
Tulikoura - https://www.deviantart.com/tulikoura

title: What are Were-worms? | Tolkien Explained
